entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a student at Hogwarts, mentioned as having a nervous and eager tone. He is also referred to as 'your mother' by Harry, indicating that he has a close relationship with his mother.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is another student at Hogwarts, mentioned as bending over his trunk to retrieve a slipper. He is described as going 'oddly still' when Seamus speaks.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as having a temper and using his wand to defend himself against Seamus's accusations.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another student at Hogwarts, who appears in the doorway during the argument between Harry and Seamus. He looks concerned and asks what's going on.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts, mentioned as someone to whom Seamus can go if he has a problem sharing a dormitory with Harry.

relationships.description: Seamus and Harry are arguing, with Seamus accusing Harry of lying and Harry defending himself.
Ron appears in the doorway during the argument between Harry and Seamus, looking concerned for Harry's well-being.
